alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Northwest Beaverhead County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 14 at 12:35AM MDT until March 16 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations 1 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 9 inches, with up to 12 inches above pass level. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...East Glacier Park Region and Northwest Beaverhead County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 AM MDT this morning. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure they are prepared for dangerous conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Northwest Beaverhead County
